data.comment: The big names in today's match at Estadio do Restelo have now been confirmed.
The match has started, with Braga kicking-off.
In the minute 1, Free kick Belenenses.
Throw-in for Belenenses in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Belenenses awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
In the minute 7, Throw-in Belenenses.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Belenenses have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 10, Silvestre Varela of Belenenses smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Important block from the Belenenses defence as Paulinho fires in a strike for Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 11, In Lisbon Braga's Paulinho is caught offside.
Braga's Paulinho is whistled for offside at Estadio do Restelo.
Throw-in for Braga at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 15, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Belenenses.
Free kick for Braga in the half of Belenenses.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 18, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Belenenses's Miguel Cardoso breaks free at Estadio do Restelo. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 19, Goal kick for Braga at Estadio do Restelo.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Braga.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 22, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Ruben Lima (Belenenses) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 25, Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Throw-in for Belenenses close to the penalty box.
In the minute 26, Miguel Cardoso (Belenenses) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Helder Malheiro awards Braga a goal kick.
Free kick Belenenses.
In the minute 30, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 31, Belenenses attack but Tiago Esgaio's header doesn't find the target.
Braga have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Braga.
In the minute 33, Belenenses to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Miguel Cardoso is on target to give Belenenses a 1-0 advantage.
Phete instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 37, Helder Malheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Braga awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
In the minute 39, Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 40, In Lisbon, Bruno Viana (Braga) misses the target with a header.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Belenenses.
In the minute 41, Ball safe as Braga is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in high up the field for Braga in Lisbon.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for Belenenses in the half of Braga.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Braga in their own half.
Braga are pushing forward but Wenderson Galeno's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Belenenses have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
In the minute 45, 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Lisbon.
Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio do Restelo.
Goal! Belenenses extend their lead to 2-0 through Afonso Sousa.
The second-half is underway. Belenenses with the kick-off.
Belenenses drive forward but Silvestre Varela is judged offside.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
The away team have replaced Al Musrati with Fransergio. This is the first substitution made today by Carlos Carvalhal.
In the minute 46, Carlos Carvalhal (Braga) is making a second substitution, with Guilherme Schettine replacing Iuri Medeiros.
In the minute 47, Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
Braga are coming forward and Paulinho gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 48, It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
Can Braga capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Belenenses's half?
Braga's Andre Castro gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Restelo. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 50, Corner awarded to Braga.
Guilherme Schettine (Braga) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
In the minute 51, Braga pushes forward through Fransergio, whose finish on goal is saved.
Braga's Guilherme Schettine has run offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 53, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Braga.
In Lisbon Braga drive forward through Fransergio. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 55, Helder Malheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Belenenses's half.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
Helder Malheiro awards Belenenses a goal kick.
In the minute 58, Silvestre Varela for the home team is judged to be offside.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, David Carmo (Braga) sees red and is sent off in Lisbon!
Can Belenenses capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Danny Henriques (Belenenses) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
In the minute 66, Corner awarded to Belenenses.
Braga awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 70, Braga have been given a penalty at Estadio do Restelo...
Goal! Braga now trail just 2-1 thanks to a Paulinho spot-kick.
Free kick for Belenenses in their own half.
In the minute 73, Belenenses awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Braga in their own half.
Belenenses to take a throw-in in Braga territory.
In the minute 75, The home team replace Silvestre Varela with Francisco Teixeira.
Ball safe as Belenenses is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Helder Malheiro signals a Braga throw-in in Belenenses's half.
In the minute 78, Throw-in Braga.
In Lisbon, Paulinho of Braga is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In Lisbon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 79, Francisco Teixeira (Belenenses) gets a yellow card.
Helder Malheiro signals a throw-in for Braga, close to Belenenses's area.
Corner awarded to Braga.
In the minute 81, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
Braga make their third substitution with Vitor Tormena replacing Bruno Viana.
In the minute 82, Can Belenenses get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Braga's half?
Edi Semedo is on a sub for Afonso Sousa for Belenenses.
Free kick for Braga in their own half.
Braga's Guilherme Schettine is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Belenenses at Estadio do Restelo.
Belenenses have a goal kick.
Free kick Braga.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Ball goes out of play for a Belenenses goal kick.
Braga's Paulinho misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lisbon.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Belenenses in the half of Braga.
Throw-in Braga.
Throw-in for Braga in the half of Belenenses.
Braga have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
Braga to take a throw-in in Belenenses territory.
Belenenses will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Braga.
Corner awarded to Braga.
Can Braga get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Belenenses's half?
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Belenenses in their own half.
The second-half is over. The match ends 2-1.
Caue is replacing Bruno Ramires for the home team.
Phete (Belenenses) has received a yellow card from Helder Malheiro.
Fransergio (Braga) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
